description: The frontend registration page requires the backend `registerOrganization` function to be available for integration.
mitigation_plan: Develop against a mocked API contract defined and agreed upon by both teams.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks final E2E testing of the registration flow.

description: The registration completion page requires the `completeRegistration` backend function to activate the user.
mitigation_plan: Define API contract early. Backend team to provide an early version for integration.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the entire user invitation workflow.

description: The Check-In feature (US-028) cannot be implemented without the location permission handling flow (US-076).
mitigation_plan: Implement US-076 at the beginning of Sprint 3.
impact_if_delayed: Delays the entire core attendance feature set.
